title: Conference Room Reservation System API Documentation
description: Complete API documentation for the conference room reservation system backend

endpoints.name: Login
endpoints.description: Authenticates user with email and password, returns JWT token and user information

email.validation: Must be a valid email format

endpoints.name: Register
endpoints.description: Creates a new user account and returns JWT token with user information

email.validation: Must be a valid email format, must be unique

errorResponses.message: Email already exists / Invalid input data

endpoints.name: Logout
endpoints.description: Logs out the current user (client should discard the JWT token)

endpoints.name: GetAllSalons
endpoints.description: Returns list of all available conference rooms/salons

endpoints.name: GetSalonById
endpoints.description: Returns detailed information about a specific salon by ID

endpoints.name: CheckSalonAvailability
endpoints.description: Checks if a salon is available for the specified date and time range

conflictingReservations.description: List of conflicting reservations if not available

endpoints.name: CreateSalon
endpoints.description: Creates a new salon (Admin only)

endpoints.name: UpdateSalon
endpoints.description: Updates an existing salon (Admin only)

endpoints.name: DeleteSalon
endpoints.description: Deletes a salon by ID (Admin only)

endpoints.name: CreateReservation
endpoints.description: Creates a new reservation for authenticated user

salonId.description: ID of the salon to reserve

date.validation: Must be a valid date, cannot be in the past

reservationId.description: Alias for id, used for payment redirect

errorResponses.message: Invalid input data / Salon not available for selected time

endpoints.name: GetMyReservations
endpoints.description: Returns all reservations for the authenticated user

endpoints.name: GetReservationById
endpoints.description: Returns detailed information about a specific reservation

endpoints.name: CancelReservation
endpoints.description: Cancels a reservation (user can cancel their own, admin can cancel any)

endpoints.name: GetAllReservations
endpoints.description: Returns all reservations with optional filters (Admin only)

status.description: Filter by status (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, CANCELLED)

date.description: Filter by date in YYYY-MM-DD format

endpoints.name: UpdateReservationStatus
endpoints.description: Updates the status of a reservation (Admin only)

endpoints.name: ApproveReservation
endpoints.description: Approves a pending reservation (Admin only)

endpoints.name: RejectReservation
endpoints.description: Rejects a pending reservation (Admin only)

endpoints.name: GetPendingReservations
endpoints.description: Returns all pending reservations (Admin only)

endpoints.name: GetUpcomingReservations
endpoints.description: Returns reservations in the next 24 hours (Admin only)

responseBody.description: List of upcoming reservations within 24 hours

endpoints.name: GetCalendarReservations
endpoints.description: Returns approved reservations for calendar display

endpoints.name: ProcessPayment
endpoints.description: Processes payment for a reservation

reservationId.description: ID of the reservation to pay for

expiryYear.validation: Must be current year or future

errorResponses.message: Invalid payment data / Payment already completed

endpoints.name: GetPaymentByReservation
endpoints.description: Returns payment information for a specific reservation

endpoints.name: GetMyPayments
endpoints.description: Returns all payments made by the authenticated user

endpoints.name: RefundPayment
endpoints.description: Processes a refund for a payment (Admin only)

errorResponses.message: Payment cannot be refunded / Already refunded

endpoints.description: Profile management endpoints for user personal information, address, and saved cards - FULLY IMPLEMENTED

endpoints.name: GetProfile
endpoints.description: Returns full user profile including personal info, address, and saved card information

cardNumber.description: Masked card number (only last 4 digits visible)

card.note: CVV is NEVER stored or returned for security reasons

endpoints.name: UpdateProfile
endpoints.description: Updates user profile information (name, email, phone, address, card)

email.validation: Must be valid email format if provided, must be unique

address.description: Address information - all fields are optional

card.description: Card information to save - IMPORTANT: In production, card data should be tokenized via payment gateway first
card.note: CVV should NEVER be stored. For production: use payment gateway tokenization

errorResponses.message: Invalid input data / Email already exists / Invalid card information

endpoints.name: UpdatePassword
endpoints.description: Updates user password

newPassword.validation: Minimum 6 characters, must be different from current password

errorResponses.message: Invalid password / New password too short / Current password incorrect

endpoints.name: UpdateEmail
endpoints.description: Updates user email address

email.validation: Must be valid email format, must be unique

errorResponses.message: Invalid email format / Email already exists

endpoints.name: UpdatePhone
endpoints.description: Updates user phone number

authentication.description: Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header as 'Bearer <token>'

roles.USER: Regular user - can create reservations, view own data, update own profile
roles.ADMIN: Administrator - can manage salons, approve/reject reservations, process refunds, view all data

validationRules.name: Minimum 3 characters
validationRules.date: YYYY-MM-DD format, cannot be in the past

frontend_requirements: Frontend expects 'reservationId' or 'id' field in reservation creation response for payment redirect
Frontend expects token and user object in login/register responses
Frontend shows masked card numbers for security (**** **** **** 1234)
Frontend calendar component needs approved reservations with date, startTime, endTime
Frontend profile page has 4 tabs: Personal Info, Address, Card Info, Password
security_notes: IMPORTANT: Card information should be tokenized via payment gateway (e.g., iyzico, Stripe) before storing
CVV should NEVER be stored in database
Only last 4 digits of card number should be visible to users
Password must be hashed using BCrypt or similar
JWT tokens should have reasonable expiration time (e.g., 24 hours)
implementation_priority: 1. Profile GET/PUT endpoints (highest priority - needed for Profile page)
3. Email/Phone update endpoints (optional, can use main profile update)
4. Card tokenization integration with payment gateway
